block.p: TREITMAN-Janet. Beloved wife of the late Dr. Arnold. Loving mother of Susan and Bill Stein, Sally and Richard Eisenberg, Jo and Roger Drawec. Beloved grandmother of Sonia and Eric Pendergrass, Heather and Mark Palumbo, Arnold and Brandyn Stein, Allison Eisenberg, Alex and Evy Drawec, and great grandmother of Abby and Lisa Pendergrass. Donations to Alzheimer's Association, 99 South St., Patchogue, LI, or Girl Scouts Nassau Council, Garden City, Long Island, would be appreciated. Services ''Boulevard-Riverside'', 1450 Broadway, Hewlett, LI, at 10:30 A.M. Sunday.
